mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_PWD, A.PHONE, A.EMAIL, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL, TO_CHAR(A.JOIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DT, NVL(A.WITHDRAW_YN, '-') AS WITHDRAW_YN, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.WITHDRAW_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '-') AS WITHDRAW_DT, NVL(B.ORDER_COUNT, 0) AS ORDER_COUNT, NVL(B.ORDER_PRICE, 0) AS ORDER_PRICE FROM TB_USER_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID ,COUNT(*) ORDER_COUNT,SUM(ORDER_PRICE) ORDER_PRICE FROM TB_ORDER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY USER_ID ) B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.ORDER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.ORDER_GOODS_NAME, A.ORDER_PRICE, A.ORDER_STATUS, A.RECEIVE_NAME, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL, B.BUY_QTY FROM TB_ORDER_INFO A , ( SELECT ORDER_NO,SUM(BUY_QTY) BUY_QTY FROM TB_ORDER_GOODS GROUP BY ORDER_NO ) B WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND USER_ID = #{userId}
